content.question: What is the radius of curvature of the path of the proton?

choices.label: <math alttext="e v sub 0, end sub, times B" overflow="scroll"><mi>e</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>B</mi></math>
<math alttext="2 e v sub 0, end sub, times B" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>B</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator m sub p, end sub, times v sub 0, end sub, and denominator e B" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
